game.name: Barrel Madness
game.categories: Single-player, Full controller support, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: A fast-paced 3D action platformer where you jump across speeding barrels, dodge deadly traps, and defeat enemies in chaotic fantasy worlds. Time your moves, throw your sword from afar, and survive the madness.
game.shortDescriptionEn: A fast-paced 3D action platformer where you jump across speeding barrels, dodge deadly traps, and defeat enemies in chaotic fantasy worlds. Time your moves, throw your sword from afar, and survive the madness.
